title: How Does It Feel
lyrics:
How does it feel
When your walls fall down?
How does it feel
When your love stand found?
How does it feel
It's the sweetest sound

How does it feel



I can feel my fire burning

Got my mind in overdrive

Lose focus, vision blurring

And time is on the line

There's no mistake

'Cause I know what I'm craving

And I don't wanna wait no more

And I control this path that I'm taking

But I don't wanna wait no more



How does it feel

When your walls fall down?

How does it feel

When your love stand found?

How does it feel

It's the sweetest sound

How does it feel



How does it feel

How does it feel

How does it feel



I'll face my fears, no running

Got my faith up on the ground

Set sail, the ocean's calling

To find a land un-found

There's no mistake 'cause

I know what I'm craving

And I don't wanna wait no more

And I control this path that I'm taking

But I don't wanna wait no more



How does it feel

When your walls fall down?

How does it feel

When your love stand found?

How does it feel

It's the sweetest sound

How does it feel



How does it feel

How does it feel

How does it feel



I gotta get up

How does it feel

I gotta get up

How does it feel

How does it feel
